item.title: PassBlueâ€™s New UN Crossword
item.description: The PassBlue UN Crossword: Are You Fluent in Diplomacy? Welcome to our new crossword puzzle, testing your knowledge of the 80-year-old international body that is well known but also misunderstood. The puzzle is meant to reinforce the UN's basic role in the world, which, as the US likes now repeat, is to maintain peace and security. One word in the puzzle sums up the main tool of the organization. Can you guess which one?
